location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 64 of 1853 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government, Secret Department, Bombay to Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter — in response to the Resident's communication No. 8 of 23 December 1852 — is stating that the Bombay Government approves of the Resident's intentions; the Resident has proposed a non-committal stance with respect to a proposed attack on Ṣuḥār.
